fieldmapsdirname.desc: Subdirectory in subject dir for fieldmaps

structdirname.desc: Subdirectory in subject dir for MRI structurals

specialseriesdirname.desc: Subdirectory in subject dir for special series

eventsdirname.desc: Subdirectory in study, subject and/or session for event files

rawdatadir.desc: Directories to find raw MRI data

rawdataafterconversionprefix.desc: Prefix of raw data after conversion from DICOM to NIFTI

rawseries_usefileorder.desc: In raw data, use number in file listing not filtering by series number

remotefilesystem.desc: Type of files for imaging data

dicomfolderstructure.desc: Dicom folder structure, "flat" if all files in one directory (e.g., Robarts), "series" if series in separate directory (e.g., CBU)

subjectoutputformat.desc: sprintf formatting string to get subject directory from number

seriesoutputformat.desc: sprintf formatting string to get series directory from number - at AWS Series_%04d at CBU Series_%03d*; at CABI *_%d

linuxshell.desc: Linux shell used to run linux commands

fslsetup.desc: Path to fsl setup script, executing before any fsl command

freesurfersetup.desc: Path to FreeSurfer setup script, executing before any FreeSurfer command

freesurferenvironment.desc: Path to FreeSurfer environmental setup script, executing before any FreeSurfer command

templatedir.desc: Path to folder with various templates (e.g. for aamod_freesurfer_deface)

allowremotecache.desc: Allow local caching of files from remote server

poolprofile.desc: MATLAB function to create cluster profile on local machine (should be in your MATLAB path)

mailerserver.desc: E-mail address and password (colon-sepertated) for the mailer account for sending notifications

maximumretry.desc: Maximum number of (re)tries to retrieve file

garbagecollection.desc: Perform garbage collection after the analysis

aaworkercleanup.desc: Remove aaworker folders older then the specified number of days (Empty means no cleanup)

restorepath.desc: Restore linux and MATLAB path upon closing

diagnostic_videos.desc: Enable diagnostic videos (matlab not stable on some platforms)
